description: This source file defines an Entity Framework Core DbContext named AppDbContext for the Notes backend, managing the Note entities and configuring the entity model, including key constraints, property configurations, indexes, and database mappings.

classes.name: AppDbContext
classes.description: Entity Framework Core database context class for accessing Note entities and configuring their schema.

methods.name: AppDbContext
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the DbContext with given options.

methods.name: OnModelCreating
methods.description: Overrides the default model creation to configure entity properties, keys, indexes, and conversions for the Note entity.
